main_definition: An inkjet is a type of printer that uses tiny nozzles to spray small droplets of liquid ink onto paper.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A printing technology that utilizes small print head with microscopic nozzles
meanings_and_examples.example: We use an inkjet printer to get high-quality color prints at home.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The liquid used by inkjet printers to produce images and text on paper
meanings_and_examples.example: Our office's inkjet cartridges need replacement as they are almost empty.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A type of digital photography process that resembles traditional printing techniques using a liquid medium
meanings_and_examples.example: The photographer used an inkjet method to create the image on canvas.
